Patricia et al. also observed similar phenomenon in pancreatic cancer, supporting that some CSC populations are dependent on oxidative metabolism 77.BCSCs are involved in multiple biological behaviors of breast cancer
BCSCs are engaged in the physical behaviors of cancer, including recurrence, metastasis, vasculogenic mimicry, angiogenesis, and therapeutic resistance (Figure 1).
All these components exhibit dynamic changes during cancer progression and are associated with cancer stemness (Figure 2).
